attr.title: cityglitch
attr.desc: Cityglitch is an indie puzzle game where you play as a sorcerer saving a glitching city. Navigate fragmented urban landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and use magic to restore harmony. With a minimalist art style and soothing soundtrack, Cityglitch offers a captivating and thought-provoking experience.
attr.inst: Download the game from Steam or from itch.io and copy the exe or love file into the port folder.
